dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I really just hope to get his answer and move this along...I am getting too used to dealing with these freaks.

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Aha! What a bold and brazen attitude! Yes it appears you are the man I was looking for.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: What does he mean man he is looking for?
